price: N’umugore we (Sara) yari ahagaze (inyuma y’urusika abumva), maze araseka (atangajwe n’ibyo yumvise). Nuko tumuha inkuru nziza yo kuzabyara Is’haqa (Isaka), na nyuma Is’haqa (akazabyara) Yaqub (Yakobo).
arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-im'ra-atuhu qāimatun faḍaḥikat fabasharnāhā bi-is'ḥāqa wamin warāi is'ḥāqa yaʿqūba
translations: Then We gave her glad tidings
